New Records: Jeffrey Vandersay took a six-wicket haul in the match
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka defeated India by 32 runs
India's chase ended at 208 runs in 42.2 overs
Jeffrey Vandersay was the player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat first
Experts predicted India as favorites but Sri Lanka performed well
Key player matchups included Virat Kohli vs. Jeffrey Vandersay
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's win was a significant morale booster
Jeffrey Vandersay's performance was praised by his team
The match ended India's 11-match win streak against Sri Lanka in ODIs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo
Sri Lanka's total was 241 runs, India managed 208 runs
Weather and pitch conditions affected the match
Others: Team lineups for both India and Sri Lanka were detailed
Player performances were analyzed in depth
